title: Amantya Technologies bags multi-year contract to develop DoT's unified portal
description: Amantya has bagged the contract from an independent business vertical of the state-run Centre for Development of Telematics (C-DOT), eTelecom Transformation Centre (eTT), that has been created for the specific purpose for the development of the Department of Telecom's (DoT) unified portal and its digital by design implementation as per the Telecommunication Act 2023.
content: IT company Amantya Technologies on Thursday said it has bagged a multi-year contract to develop its unified web portal in line with the Telecommunication Act 2023.
cleaned_content: it company amantya technologies on thursday said it has bagged a multi year contract to develop its unified web portal in line with the telecommunication act <TWO_THOUSAND>
